td.content: s:pt reports Kidney from time to time. he is a 39 YO white male. o:Height 181 cm, Weight 77.8 kg, Temperature 36.9 C, Pulse 74, SystolicBP 113, DiastolicBP 72, Respiration 17 a:Pyelonephritis p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed Ciprofloxacin - 500 mg 2xday x 10 d, and ordered Urine culture.

s:patient presents with Kidney of 7 days duration. patient is a 40 yo white male interrogator. o:Height 180 cm, Weight 75.3 kg, Temperature 37.2 C, Pulse 67, SystolicBP 104, DiastolicBP 63, Respiration 14 a:Pyelonephritis p:performed E/M Level 2 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed Levofloxacin - 500 mg daily x 10 days, and ordered Urinalysis.
